views.markdown: **EmojiPort needs to be installed if you also want new emojis.** This tweak allows you to override system's emoji font without swapping them. Access Settings app > EmojFontManager to choose your font. Fonts (folder with extension .font AND having AppleColorEmoji@2x.ttf/.ttc font inside) that can be used by this tweak should be placed in /Library/Themes/EmojiFontManager. It is highly recommended to respring after you change the font.
- Reworked Settings page for better visual in recent iOS versions
